newsitem.title: USA: Spacetec IMC says expects Q4 net loss.
newsitem.headline: Spacetec IMC says expects Q4 net loss.

text.p: Spacetec IMC Corp said it expects to report a loss of $1.3 million in the fourth quarter ended March 31, which is in line with analysts' expectations.
First Call consensus estimates the company will report a loss of $0.16 per share for the fourth quarter.

The company has reported fourth quarter revenues for 1997 of $2.0 million as compared with $2.3 million in 1996. The company also reported fiscal year 1997 revenues of $9.1 million as compared with $8.1 million in 1996.
Spacetec IMC produces RealLife 3D interactive motion control input devices and software.
